scripts.imagemin: imagemin images/* --out-dir dist/images && imagemin images/masters/* --out-dir dist/images/masters && imagemin images/servants/* --out-dir dist/images/servants
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin params.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/params.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
